owun ek paththakin 13 saha 17 wani sanshodhana balaganwannayi illa sitimin ma thawath paththakin palath sabhawe niladharin iwath karannayi kima gataluwak bawayi.uthuru palath sabhawa yam lesakin wisuruwa harimata rajaya katayuthu karannedayi mehidi kala wimasumakata pilithuru dan amathiwaraya pawasuwe eya wisuruwimata aandukrama wyawasthawa anuwa janadhipathiwarayata nohaki bawath, eya wisuruwa harima awashya nam ee bawa thindu kala yuththe maha amathiwaraya wisin ma bawath ya.esema ohu ganna wu thiranaya aandukarawaraya wetha danumdimen pasu janadhipathiwaraya wisin eki thinduwa prakashayata path karanu labana bawada kiweya.eheth indiyawe janadhipathiwarayata prantha aanduwak wisuruwa harime hakiyawa pawathina bawa ki amathiwaraya ee anuwa gathwita shri lankawe kriyathmaka 13wani aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaya indiyawe pawathina kramaya da ikmawa giya balayak sahitha kramayak yayida penwa dunneya.
